title: Hanwha logotype ID?
content:
Hi? I am trying to ID typeface used for Hanwha Corp.

[http://www.hanwha.co.kr/kor/images/company/signature\_tbox\_ci03.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231240/http:/www.hanwha.co.kr/kor/images/company/signature_tbox_ci03.gif "http://www.hanwha.co.kr/kor/images/company/signature\_tbox\_ci03.gif")

Thanks in advance!

 [‹ type ID 'speak up' UC](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231240/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41694 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hey can you help ID this font? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203231240/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41718 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sangwooksohn
